document_data.name: Frouth
document_data.History: In 1484 DR, during the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Frouth was a member of the [[orc]] army that besieged [[Mithral Hall]]. He accompanied [[Szordrin Xorlarrin]] to secretly infiltrate the Keep as added muscle. However, he was discovered and defeated by an adventuring party.
